subject: order not shiping
description_text:
Dear, I'm interested in what's happening with my order. I ordered pedals on
12/25/2025 and when I go to your link it only says confirmed and not sent,
the order number is SSN5275

conversations.body_text: Hi Marko Krsmanovic,    We apologize for the delay in shipping your order. Here is your tracking link.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=ALS01360071879

Dear, When I go in to check where the package is, it says there is a
problem, can you check what is happening?

On Sat, 17 Jan 2026 at 10:34, service@simsonn.com
Hi Marko Krsmanovic,    This product is currently out of stock at our original warehouse. We have placed a new order for you. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
